languages.text: {n}Наконец Ирлиэт замечает ваш взгляд.{/n} "О элантах, ты... все это время оставал{mf|ся|ась} подле меня? Прости слабость моему потрясенному разуму и надломленному духу. Наблюдать за страданиями собратьев невыносимая пытка. Но она не сравнится с тем, что сотворили Темные. Видишь? В этих фигурах, в этой доске для увеселительных игр... заточена душа провидицы с Крудараха. И она терзает меня больнее и безжалостней, чем треххвостая плеть истязает плоть своих жертв".

traits.locale_text: {n}Наконец Ирлиэт замечает ваш взгляд.{/n} "О элантах, ты... все это время оставал{mf|ся|ась} подле меня? Прости слабость моему потрясенному разуму и надломленному духу. Наблюдать за страданиями собратьев невыносимая пытка. Но она не сравнится с тем, что сотворили Темные. Видишь? В этих фигурах, в этой доске для увеселительных игр... заточена душа провидицы с Крудараха. И она терзает меня больнее и безжалостней, чем треххвостая плеть истязает плоть своих жертв".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."
languages.original_text: {n}Наконец Ирлиэт замечает ваш взгляд.{/n} "О элантах, ты... все это время оставал{mf|ся|ась} подле меня? Прости слабость моему потрясенному разуму и надломленному духу. Наблюдать за страданиями собратьев невыносимая пытка. Но она не сравнится с тем, что сотворили Темные. Видишь? В этих фигурах, в этой доске для увеселительных игр... заточена душа провидицы с Крудараха. И она терзает меня больнее и безжалостней, чем треххвостая плеть истязает плоть своих жертв".

Watching one's kinspeople suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these game pieces, within this board designed for a pastime... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes the flesh of its victims."

And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes the flesh of its victims."

And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Finalmente, Yrliet se percata de tu mirada.{/n} «Oh, elantach, tú... ¿has estado junto a mí todo este tiempo? Disculpa la flaqueza de mi mente espantada y mi espíritu abatido. Contemplar el sufrimiento de mis congéneres ya es una tortura insoportable, pero no puede compararse con lo que han hecho los Oscuros. ¿No lo ves? Prisionera en el interior de estas piezas, en este tablero diseñado como divertimento... está el alma de una vidente de Crudarach. Y me atormenta de un modo más doloroso y despiadado que el azote de un látigo de tres colas».
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Finalmente, Yrliet se percata de tu mirada.{/n} «Oh, elantach, tú... ¿has estado junto a mí todo este tiempo? Disculpa la flaqueza de mi mente espantada y mi espíritu abatido. Contemplar el sufrimiento de mis congéneres ya es una tortura insoportable, pero no puede compararse con lo que han hecho los Oscuros. ¿No lo ves? Prisionera en el interior de estas piezas, en este tablero diseñado como divertimento... está el alma de una vidente de Crudarach. Y me atormenta de un modo más doloroso y despiadado que el azote de un látigo de tres colas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ようやくユリエットはあなたの視線に気づいた。{/n} 「ああ、エランタよ、あなたは…ずっと我の側にいてくれたのか？弱いゆえにショックを受けたこの心と傷ついた精神を許してくれ。誰かの血族が苦しむのを見るのは耐え難い拷問だ。だがそれも暗黒の者たちの所業とは比べものにならない。見えるか？この駒の中に、この娯楽のためにデザインされた遊戯盤の中に封じ込められているのは…クルダラの先見司の魂だ。そして彼女が、三尾鞭で被害者の肉体を打つ時よりも、さらに痛々しく残酷に我を拷問するのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}ようやくユリエットはあなたの視線に気づいた。{/n} 「ああ、エランタよ、あなたは…ずっと我の側にいてくれたのか？弱いゆえにショックを受けたこの心と傷ついた精神を許してくれ。誰かの血族が苦しむのを見るのは耐え難い拷問だ。だがそれも暗黒の者たちの所業とは比べものにならない。見えるか？この駒の中に、この娯楽のためにデザインされた遊戯盤の中に封じ込められているのは…クルダラの先見司の魂だ。そして彼女が、三尾鞭で被害者の肉体を打つ時よりも、さらに痛々しく残酷に我を拷問するのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}到了最后，伊莉耶特终于注意到了你的目光。{/n}“噢，外界人，你……一直都在我身边吗？请原谅我的震惊，还有我那因懦弱破碎的灵魂。亲眼看着族人受苦是一种难以忍受的折磨，但这种折磨与那些黑暗子嗣所做的事情相比，根本无法相提并论。你能看到吗？这些棋子里，这个用来娱乐的棋盘里……囚禁着克鲁达拉赫先知的灵魂。她折磨着我，她带给我的痛苦，远胜于鞭打受害者肉体的三尾钉鞭。”
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}到了最后，伊莉耶特终于注意到了你的目光。{/n}“噢，外界人，你……一直都在我身边吗？请原谅我的震惊，还有我那因懦弱破碎的灵魂。亲眼看着族人受苦是一种难以忍受的折磨，但这种折磨与那些黑暗子嗣所做的事情相比，根本无法相提并论。你能看到吗？这些棋子里，这个用来娱乐的棋盘里……囚禁着克鲁达拉赫先知的灵魂。她折磨着我，她带给我的痛苦，远胜于鞭打受害者肉体的三尾钉鞭。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Enfin, Yrliet prend conscience de votre regard.{/n} « Oh, elantach, vous... vous avez été à mes côtés tout ce temps ? Pardonnez la faiblesse de mon esprit choqué et brisé. Voir son peuple souffrir est un véritable supplice. Mais ce n'est rien par rapport à ce que les Eldars noirs ont fait. Voyez-vous de quoi je parle ? Emprisonnée dans ces pions, dans ce plateau de jeu... se trouve l'âme d'un Grand Prophète de Crudarach. Et elle me torture plus cruellement et plus durement encore que le fouet qui écorche ses victimes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Enfin, Yrliet prend conscience de votre regard.{/n} « Oh, elantach, vous... vous avez été à mes côtés tout ce temps ? Pardonnez la faiblesse de mon esprit choqué et brisé. Voir son peuple souffrir est un véritable supplice. Mais ce n'est rien par rapport à ce que les Eldars noirs ont fait. Voyez-vous de quoi je parle ? Emprisonnée dans ces pions, dans ce plateau de jeu... se trouve l'âme d'un Grand Prophète de Crudarach. Et elle me torture plus cruellement et plus durement encore que le fouet qui écorche ses victimes. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Schließlich erkennt und erwidert Yrliet deinen Blick.{/n} "Oh, Elantach, Ihr ... wart die ganze Zeit an meiner Seite? Vergebt mir meine Schwäche, mein Verstand war erschüttert und mein Geist gebrochen. Es ist eine unerträgliche Qual, seine eigene Art leiden zu sehen. Aber es ist kein Vergleich zu dem, was die Dunklen getan haben. Seht Ihr es? Hier in den Spielfiguren auf dem Spielbrett, das eigentlich zur Unterhaltung dienen soll, wird ... die Seele einer Runenprophetin von Crudarach gefangen gehalten. Und sie peinigt mich schmerzhafter und unbarmherziger als dreischwänzige Peitschen das Fleisch ihrer Opfer malträtieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schließlich erkennt und erwidert Yrliet deinen Blick.{/n} "Oh, Elantach, Ihr ... wart die ganze Zeit an meiner Seite? Vergebt mir meine Schwäche, mein Verstand war erschüttert und mein Geist gebrochen. Es ist eine unerträgliche Qual, seine eigene Art leiden zu sehen. Aber es ist kein Vergleich zu dem, was die Dunklen getan haben. Seht Ihr es? Hier in den Spielfiguren auf dem Spielbrett, das eigentlich zur Unterhaltung dienen soll, wird ... die Seele einer Runenprophetin von Crudarach gefangen gehalten. Und sie peinigt mich schmerzhafter und unbarmherziger als dreischwänzige Peitschen das Fleisch ihrer Opfer malträtieren."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, en nihayetinde bakışlarını fark ediyor.{/n} "Elantach, sen... Bunca zamandır yanımda mıydın? Şaşkına dönen zihnimin ve yıkılmış ruhumun gösterdiği zayıflığın kusuruna bakma. Soydaşının çektiği eziyeti izlemek, dayanılması güç bir işkencedir. Yine de bunu Karalar'ın yaptıklarıyla kıyaslayamam. Görüyor musun? Bir Ötesezen'in ruhu... Eğlence amaçlı tasarlanmış bu oyun tahtasına, bu taşlara hapis. Bana kurbanının etinde yaralar açan, üç kuyruklu kamçıdan daha büyük bir acıyla, daha zalimce işkence ediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Finally, Yrliet becomes aware of your gaze.{/n} "Oh, elantach, you... have been by my side all this time? Forgive my shocked mind and broken spirit for their weakness. Watching one's kin suffer is an unbearable torture. But it cannot compare to what the Dark Ones have done. Can you see? Imprisoned within these pieces, within this board designed to entertain... is the soul of a Crudarach Farseer. And she tortures me more painfully and more ruthlessly than the three-tailed whip lashes its victims' flesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, en nihayetinde bakışlarını fark ediyor.{/n} "Ah elantach, sen... Bunca zaman yanımda mıydın? Şaşkına dönen zihnimin ve yıkılmış ruhumun gösterdiği zayıflığın kusuruna bakma. Soydaşının çektiği eziyeti izlemek, dayanılması güç bir işkencedir. Yine de bunu Karalar'ın yaptıklarıyla kıyaslayamam. Görüyor musun? Eğlendirmek için tasarlanmış bu oyun tahtasında, bu oyun parçaları içinde hapsedilen... Bir Ötesezen'in ruhu. Bana kurbanının etinde yaralar açan üç kuyruklu kamçıdan daha büyük bir acıyla ve daha zalimce bir işkence yapıyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
